Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services and the Committee on Education

Items.Title: Oversight - Educational Services for New York City's Detained, Placed, and Incarcerated Youth, Adolescents, and Young Adults.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Educational Services for New York City's Detained, Placed, and Incarcerated Youth, Adolescents, and Young Adults.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services and the Committee on Education

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education and the department of correction to report on educational programming for adolescents and young adults
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the DOE and the DOC to report on educational programming for adolescents and young adults.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Reynoso, Dromm, Chin, Cabrera, Levine, Eugene, Kallos, Levin, Rodriguez, Rosenthal and Maisal

Items.Title: Oversight - Educational Services for New York City's Detained, Placed, and Incarcerated Youth, Adolescents, and Young Adults.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Educational Services for New York City's Detained, Placed, and Incarcerated Youth, Adolescents, and Young Adults.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education and the department of correction to report on educational programming for adolescents and young adults
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the DOE and the DOC to report on educational programming for adolescents and young adults.
